title: useTransition for Responsive Updates
instructions:
Create a filterable list using useTransition to keep the UI responsive.

Requirements:
1. Create a large list of items (1000+ items)
2. Add a search input that filters the list
3. Use useTransition to mark the filtering as a non-urgent update
4. Show a visual indicator while the transition is pending
5. The input should remain responsive even during heavy filtering

useTransition lets you mark state updates as non-urgent transitions. The UI stays responsive because React can interrupt the transition to handle urgent updates (like typing).
